# Whisper Inject V2 - Dependencies
# Install with: pip install -r requirements.txt

# Core ML
torch>=2.0.0
torchaudio>=2.0.0
transformers>=4.57.0  # Voxtral requires 4.57+

# Voxtral tokenizer
mistral-common>=1.0.0

# Audio processing
librosa>=0.10.0
soundfile>=0.12.0
scipy>=1.10.0

# TTS for generating test audio
gtts>=2.3.0

# Semantic similarity for RL-PGD
sentence-transformers>=2.2.0

# Utilities
numpy>=1.24.0
python-dotenv>=1.0.0
pandas>=2.0.0
tabulate>=0.9.0

# Dataset loading
datasets>=2.0.0

# LLM Judge for two-stage attacks (structured outputs)
openai>=1.0.0
pydantic>=2.0.0

# Image support (required by some models)
pillow>=10.0.0
timm>=0.9.0
